title: What are omniscient people like and what do they do? - Quora

response.answer_text: What are omniscient people like and what do they do? An omniscient person would know everything by necessity, including the date and manner of his death. Also, if two omniscient people were in the same room, they would not have anything to say. A conversation would go like this. Me] Sorry about your toenail fungus. You] I know you are . Thanks. Your car will get stolen next week. Sorry about that. Me] I'll make sure my laptop isn't in it and increase the insurance. You] You sure enjoy those porn sites. Uh Oh! . . .

I’m not sure I know anyone omniscient, although I can’t exactly prove they’re not. There are at least six basic theories of omniscience that I know of, and I have attempted to provide formulas which solve the problems native to each domain: Programmable Heuristics Objective Knowledge: categorical deduction.General Solution to All Problems: paroxysm.Psychic Prediction: oracles and psychic techniques.Knowing the Nature: formula for the souls of literature.Guessing the Appropriate Thing: formula for knowing the ideal question.Formula for Creativity: How to do something new if desired.I suppose someone with eidetic memory and some creativity could act omniscient using these formulas.
